title: Shia LaBeouf busted for public intoxication in Texas
text: Shia LaBeouf busted for public intoxication in Texas Saturday, 10 October 2015 (15 minutes ago) Washington D.C., Oct.10 : Shia LaBeouf seems to be in trouble again as he has been arrested outside a bar in Texas for public intoxication. Shia LaBeouf was just arrested in Austin, Texas ... and a witness says the actor was blitzed, out of control and disobeyed police. Recent related news Shia LaBeouf was arrested in Austin, Texas on Friday October 9th for basically being a hot drunk mess. Shia was running up and down the street in front of a bar... Celeb Dirty Laundry 3 hours ago - Celebrities Actor Shia LaBeouf has been arrested and charged with public intoxication after an incident in Austin, Texas. MyNorthwest.com 3 hours ago - Entertainment Actor Shia LaBeouf was arrested by police in Austin,Texas Friday night. FOXNews.com 4 hours ago - Entertainment Shia LaBeouf has been arrested again, this time at the Austin City Limits music festival in Austin, Texas, TheWrap has learned. Officers noticed the actorâ€™s... The Wrap 4 hours ago - US He was arrested for public intoxication. USATODAY.com 4 hours ago - Entertainment Shia LaBeouf was arrested for public intoxication on Friday evening (October 8) in Austin, Texas, according to TMZ. The 29-year-old actor was in the city... Just Jared 4 hours ago - Entertainment A witness told TMZ that he "was either extremely drunk or high on drugs" and was running down the street before jaywalking in front of police in Austin, Texas.
